Sequence Information.Target Organism: Active against S. mutans and S. aureus.
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Comments: The cyclic structure is critical for antimicrobial activity against S. aureus.

Literature.Title: Labaditin, a cyclic peptide with rich biotechnological potential preliminary toxicological studies and structural changes in water and lipid membrane environment.
Literature.Author: Barbosa SC, Cilli EM, Dias LG, Stabeli RG, Ciancaglini P.

Literature.Title: The importance of cyclic structure for Labaditin on its antimicrobial activity against Staphylococcus aureus.
Literature.Author: Barbosa SC, Nobre TM, Volpati D, Ciancaglini P, Cilli EM, Lorenz
